sense.gloss: Gion Festival (in Kyoto during the month of July, with high point on the 17th)
a number so great it can never be counted to
gods of the land, earthly deities
Department of Worship (under the ritsuryō system)

r_ele.r: はかたぎおんやまかさ

sense.gloss: festival held in July in Fukuoka City, Hakata Gion Yamakasa Festival (often just called Yamakasa Festival)
Gion Festival (in Kyoto during the month of July, with high point on the 17th)

sdata.j: ↑新型↑↓しんがた↓コロナウイルスの↑影響↑↓えいきょう↓で、↑今年↑↓ことし↓の↑祇園祭↑↓ぎおんまつり↓は↑中止↑↓ちゅうし↓になった。
sdata.e: Due to the coronavirus, this year's Gion Festival was put on hold.
